Class ContactTracer

java.lang.Object
Citizen
ContactTracer
public class ContactTracer
extends Citizen
This is the Contact Tracer Class for the Corona Tracker Program
Author:
Vincent Ilagan, Ralph Sanson SECTION: S15A

  • Constructor Details

    • ContactTracer

      public ContactTracer​(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String pass)
      Constructor for the Contact Tracer Class. Assigns the username and password through the superclass Citizen.
      Parameters:
      user - : the username
      pass - : the password of the account

  • Method Details

    • showCases

      public void showCases()
      Displays the assigned cases of the current instance of Contact Tracer

    • traceCase

      public boolean traceCase​(int caseNum, GovernmentOfficial govt)
      Traces a specific COVID-positive case assigned to the current instance of Contact Tracer. Possible exposed citizens are taken note of by inserting their Record Object in the Possibly Exposed ArrayList
      Parameters:
      caseNum - : Case Number of the specific case to be traced
      govt - : Reference variable of Government Official that is used to access specific methods used to trace the case provided.
      Returns:
      boolean: The result of the case whether it has been traced or provided case number is invalid.

    • isPositiveVisit

      public boolean isPositiveVisit​(Record allVisits, CoronaCase posCase)
      Determines if the COVID-positive user visit has been before or after they have declared positive.
      Parameters:
      allVisits - : Record object that contains the visit of the COVID-positive user in the Citizen ArrayList.
      posCase - : Corona Case object that contains the date of when the COVID-positive user has declared positive.
      Returns:
      boolean: if the visit was a when the COVID-positive user has declared positive.

    • getAssignedCases

      public java.util.ArrayList<CoronaCase> getAssignedCases()
      Retrieves the Corona Case ArrayList of assigned cases to specific instance of Contact Tracer.
      Returns:
      ArrayList: the ArrayList of assigned cases.

    • informCitizen

      public void informCitizen()
      Informs the exposed citizens by using the Government Official static method and passing the Possibly Exposed ArrayList.

    • checkValidCase

      public boolean checkValidCase​(int caseNum)
      Checks if given case number exists within the assigned cases of the current instance of the Contact Tracer.
      Parameters:
      caseNum - : the case number of the case to be checked.
      Returns:
      boolean: representing the result of the checking
